== UNIFIED RELEASE MANAGEMENT (URM) ==

*Allows to establish standard unified release management process*:
  * Planning and plan vs fact control
  * Build from codebase to produce binaries, apply database scripts, adjust settings in configuration files, use third-party binaries
  * Deploy releases, configure, add easy and useful monitoring to test and production Linux-hosted distributed environments

== URM Components ==

  * Build and manage distributions - [makedistr]
  * Deploy binary and configuration files - [deployment] (see also [configurationguidelines]
  * Database modifications - [database] (see also [sqlguidelines])
  * Monitoring - [monitoring]

== URM Usages ==
